name: Jim, Go!
description:
This game was made for the Indie Game Dev Beginners #002 Game Jam A game where you dodge, dodge and dodge a little bit more. 

_______________________________________________________________

Controls:
       W,A,S,D or Arrow Keys to move
       Esc or Backspace to pull up pause menu

_______________________________________________________________

I couldn't come up with any good idea for the theme so here you go: it has a 1-bit artstyle and that's about it.
